title: Radiology
cleaned_text: Our Department of Radiology is committed to serving the community with the best equipment, an unsurpassed staff, and convenient, exceptional service. We offer testing onsite at Englewood Hospital and Medical Center and at two offsite locations: Advanced Medical Imaging (AMI) in Emerson, New Jersey ( [map](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Advanced+Medical+Imaging/@40.982119,-74.005474,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x3baea1870b14c8ef?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwi-4rv_vfDKAhWLWhQKHXBFCIQQ_BIIdTAK)), and Magnus Imaging in Glen Ridge, New Jersey ( [map](https://www.google.com/maps/place/946+Bloomfield+Ave,+Glen+Ridge,+NJ+07028/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x89c255379f19b113:0xfae054d7ae5105c3?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwiP1tWTuvXMAhVJL1IKHYFWBoEQ8gEIGzAA)). We hold accreditation in MRI, CT, ultrasound, nuclear cardiology, and mammography from the American College of Radiology. Englewood Hospital and Medical Center is also home to a [School of Radiography](/for-healthcare-professionals/radiography) to develop entry-level radiographers to serve the community. We offer extended hours and same-day appointment availability. To make appointment, call
